categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The Millennium Fist was a freighter with two green gloves on its front. It was allegedly an old ship of Han Solo's that Lando Calrissian kept lying around on Cloud City. However, the Millennium Fist was in fact just a parody of the Millennium Falcon, invented by Han Solo while telling a story to his son Anakin.
